Title: Revenge for Jolly!
Actors: Brian Petsos, Kristen Wiig, Elijah Wood, Oscar Isaac
Plot: REVENGE FOR JOLLY! follows a man (Petsos) who, with the help of his cousin (Oscar Isaac), seeks to avenge the death of his beloved dog, who was killed under confusing and suspicious circumstances. The two men follow a series of clues in an attempt to track down the dog's murderer, leaving a path of destruction in their wake.
